resources.string: If this is your first time using this app then you should begin by registering a new account. If you have used this app before, then you should login to your existing account.
If you are participating in an event or field trip, or would simply prefer a temporary account, then you should continue as a guest.
Login to your existing account below to continue.
This section of the app is for advanced users, if you do not know what you are doing then press back to return to the previous section.

As this app is open-source, anyone can host their own instance of the official API service. This is often desirable for organisations that wish to keep their data on-site, or even privacy-conscious friend groups and families.
The server TLS certificates is validated using the device certificate store, so any custom root certificates should be installed there.
